name: Fowl Play (FowlPlayGame)
description:
Fowl Play is a short side-scrolling Shoot 'Em Up, designed around the prompt "Not quite what is seems" for Uppsala University's Game Design Programme.

Trailer

https://youtu.be/QWYnghY7dk8

Controls

  • WASD Movement
  • Shift = Shoot
  • Spacebar = Dash

Credits

  • Victor Brandeborg 
  • Achim Helmers
  • Oscar Hofling
  • Cody Cernohous
  • Willy Pettersson
  • Ozan Baris Ipin
